name: SpaceScape (itch) (RafaDe)
description:
• Changed the Game's name to "SpaceScape";
  • Added Jet Pack system(holding "W" on the keyboard the player will fly while the jetpack has fuel);
  • Added Jet Pack Pick Up to enable Jet Pack or recharge Jet Pack's fuel;
  • Created an sprite on "GIMP" to the Jet Pack pick up;
  • Added Jet Pack Display on UI;
  • Added a Tip on the UI screen the first time the player get the Jet Pack in each stage;
  • Added 3 different stages.

Created by Rafael Cardoso
